page.title: 10CRAFTS ON SCORAIG
page.content: CRAFTS ON SCORAIG ARE JIGSAW MAKING, SPINNING,DYING,HAND AND MACHINE KNITTING. THE JIGSAW MAKER MAKES ABOUT 50 JIGSAWS A YEAR.THEY CAN TAKE BETWEEN 24 HOURS AND 2 YEARS TO MAKE. HIS BIGGEST TO DATE IS 2.5 SQ.FT. HE RECENTLY HELD AN EXHIBITION OF HIS WORK IN EDINBURGH BUT HIS SALES ARE MADE MOSTLY THROUGH AN AGENT. THERE ARE 5 COMMERCIAL SPINNERS ON SCORAIG.THEY USE WOOL FROM THEIR OWN SHEEP AND DYE IT USING PLANTS AND ONION SKINS. THERE IS QUITE A RANGE OF COLOURS.SOME OF THE WOOL IS SOLD IN HANKS FOR WEAVING OR HAND-KNITTING. THERE ARE SEVERAL HAND-KNITTERS AND ONE MACHINE-KNITTER.THEY MAKE JUMPERS,HATS,SOCKS AND LEGWARMERS.THEY SELL THEIR GOODS PRIVATELY OR TO CRAFT SHOPS.
